00011 #define countof(arr) (sizeof(arr) / sizeof(*arr))
00012 
00013 struct coord_type
00014 {
00015   double x, y;
00016 };
00017 
00018 typedef std::list<int> curve_type;
00019 
00020 double* max_bbox(double *bb)
00021 {
00022   bb[0] = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
00023   bb[1] = bb[0];
00024   bb[2] = -bb[0];
00025   bb[3] = bb[2];
00026   return bb;
00027 }
00028 
00029 double* init_bbox(const coord_type& p, double *bb)
00030 {
00031   bb[0] = bb[2] = p.x;
00032   bb[1] = bb[3] = p.y;
00033   return bb;
00034 }
00035 
00036 class bbox
00037 {
00038   const coord_type* ver;
00039 public:
00040   bbox(const coord_type* p): ver(p)
00041   {
00042   }
00043   double* operator()(double* bb, int n) const
00044   {
00045     const coord_type* p = &ver[n];
00046     if (p->x < bb[0]) bb[0] = p->x;
00047     if (p->y < bb[1]) bb[1] = p->y;
00048     if (p->x > bb[2]) bb[2] = p->x;
00049     if (p->y > bb[3]) bb[3] = p->y;
00050     return bb;
00051   }
00052 };
00053 
00054 void main()
00055 {
00056   coord_type zz[] = 
00057   { 
00058     { 1.0, 2.0 }, 
00059     { 3.0, 4.0 }, 
00060     { 5.0, 6.0 }
00061   };
00062 
00063   curve_type cur;
00064   cur.push_back(0);
00065   cur.push_back(1);
00066   cur.push_back(2);
00067   cur.push_back(0);
00068 
00069   double bb[4];
00070   // check if it is closed curve
00071   assert(cur.size() > 3 && cur.front() == cur.back());
00072   // std::accumulate(cur.begin(), cur.end(), max_bbox(bb), bbox(zz));
00073 
00074   curve_type::iterator it = ++cur.begin();
00075   init_bbox(zz[*it], bb);
00076   std::accumulate(++it, cur.end(), bb, bbox(zz));
00077   
00078   std::cout << bb[0] << ' ' << bb[1] << ' ' << bb[2] << ' ' << bb[3] << '\n';
00079 }
